name: microflow
description: CI/CD industrialisation as a microservice architecture for the MicroFlow project.

scripts.install: cd Client && npm i && cd ../Server && npm i && cd ../Tests && npm i
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill-others --kill-others-on-fail -c red,blue --names Server,Client "npm run dev-back" "npm run dev-front"
scripts.test: concurrently --success first --kill-others --kill-others-on-fail --hide 0 -c green --names App,Tests "npm run dev" "npm run test-only"
